name: Koyo DirectLogic PLC Password Brute Force Utility
author: K. Reid Wightman <wightman@digitalbond.com>
todb <todb@metasploit.com>
description:
This module attempts to authenticate to a locked Koyo DirectLogic PLC.
        The PLC uses a restrictive passcode, which can be A0000000 through A9999999.
        The "A" prefix can also be changed by the administrator to any other character,
        which can be set through the PREFIX option of this module.

        This module is based on the original 'koyobrute.rb' Basecamp module from
        DigitalBond.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: RECV_TIMEOUT
options.description: Time (in seconds) to wait between packets

options.name: PREFIX
options.description: The prefix to use for the password (default: A)
